summary: Comprehensive analysis of CoherentBundle construction infrastructure. Tasks 851 and 852 completed all prerequisite work: CoherentBundle.toBMCS is fully proven with no sorries. Main construction requires: (1) initial CoherentBundle from Lindenbaum-extended base family, (2) generalization of diamond_boxcontent_consistent_constant to UnionBoxContent, (3) iterative or Zorn-based saturation adding coherent witnesses. The constant-family approach avoids Lindenbaum control problems that block the SaturatedConstruction.lean path.

artifacts.summary: Research report covering CoherentBundle construction strategy, existing infrastructure analysis, saturation approaches, and integration with completeness theorem
